name: Switch
description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked. Used for binary settings and preferences

props.name: checked
props.description: The controlled checked state of the switch

props.name: onCheckedChange
props.description: Event handler called when the checked state changes

props.name: id
props.description: The id attribute for the switch element

props.name: label
props.description: Optional label text to display next to the switch

author: UI Components Team
